status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine was in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with generally steady production (power_mean≈0.96, low power_std≈0.028) under moderately variable winds (wind_speed_mean≈14.6 m/s, std≈1.74) but with at least one brief extreme wind spike (wind_speed_max=39.1). Operational signals show stable rotor behavior (low rotor_rpm_std≈0.05) while generator speed varied more (generator_rpm_std≈4.56), with average pitch around 8.9° and a persistent mean yaw misalignment near 11.9°. Notable anomalies/patterns include a consistent negative power residual (mean≈−0.093) indicating a sustained power deficit relative to expectation, alongside elevated average temperature (~71.3) during this high‑wind period.
